===Etymology===
[[皇綱]] ([[皇帝]][[綱紀]]: [[imperial]] [[rule]]) + [[失]] (to [[lose]]) + [[統]] ([[體統]]: [[decorum]]; [[propriety]]; [[decency]])

{{zh-pron
|m=huánggāng shī tǒng

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} The [[system]] of [[imperial]] [[rule]] has [[been]] [[corrupted]].
